about_the_game:
A cozy idle cafe management game that runs at the bottom of your screen.

Create and manage your dream cafe without interrupting your day! Design a charming restaurant, hire an adorable staff, and grow fresh ingredients on your very own farm. Cook and serve delicious dishes while focusing on other tasks.

Features

  • Build your dream cafe
    Design, decorate, and customize your perfect cafe to match your unique style.

  • Grow Fresh Ingredients
    Plant and harvest crops from your little farm to create the freshest meals.

  • Cook & Serve
    Turn fresh ingredients into delicious meals and earn money.

  • Grow Your Business
    Reinvest your earnings to upgrade your cafe and expand your farm.

  • Playing while working
    Your friendly staff will take care of the cafe, keeping things running smoothly while you work, study, or relax.

Take a break, sip your coffee, and let your cafe flourish.
